title: The title of hyperlink builder should be 'Hyperlink Options', now it changes with settings.
description: The title of the hyperlink builder is not behaving as expected.
OB: When clicking on 'OK' and then reopening the hyperlink builder, the actual result is that its title becomes 'www.actuate.com'.
EB: The expected behavior is that the title of the hyperlink builder should remain as 'Hyperlink Options' and not change with the settings.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Click on 'OK' to close the hyperlink builder.
2. Reopen the hyperlink builder.
Actual result: The title becomes 'www.actuate.com'.
Expected result: The hyperlink builder title should be 'Hyperlink Options'.
